page.title: 04CHERRY BURTON-3
page.content: The Sports' Field Pavilion,opened in June 1985,is where the Sports' Field Management Committee and sporting clubs,using the field,meet.There is a strong cricket club, a well supported football club and a tennis club with teams playing in the Driffield leagues.The pavilion is a joint venture with the Baden-Powell organisations in the village and the Scouts/Cubs meetings are moving from the Village Hall to the Pavilion.The Guides and Brownies are expected to follow. The Village Green.What Green? Where?The open space next to the Post Office. Unlike other greens it is fenced, but children do kick a ball there and play informal cricket on a summer's evening,and older lads sit on benches and fences.The shop and Post Office are also important social meeting places.
